Title: Awakening
Description: Protagonist awakens from their crypod with cryosickness, which disorients him. Unsure of when and where they are, they have a goal of finding answers.

Title: Release hatch
Description: You see an release hatch on your left

Title: Cryo Bay
Description: Rows of pods, most sealed, a few cracked. Silence, except the hum of failing systems.

Title: Medkit
Description: You pry open a panel a medkit is found inside, you use it and feel much better

Title: Exposed Wiring
Description: Narrow maintenance corridor, flickering blue lights. Ozone. Loose burned cables.

Title: The Corridor Door
Description: Metallic hallway, dim blue strips. Sealed door with weak access panel.

Title: Corridor Encounter
Description: Dim metallic hallway. Irene and Darius approach, breath clouding in cold air.

Title: Maintenance Corridor
Description: Long, dimly lit hallway, flickering blue lights. Mist along the floor.

Title: Airlock Door
Description: Thick blast door labeled AIRLOCK under a single flickering red light.
